author: arnetheduck
content: I'm not an opponent of semi-altruistic solutions - in practice, they work well enough as long as there is a legitimate interest in the data, which in this case I believe there might be - I'm curious though if there's been any discussion as to what even an altrustic solution would look like - the nodes storing the data need to coordinate similar to how attestations are disseminated in a two-level aggregation setup - ie if nobody is designated to store the data, nobody will _for sure_ ðŸ™‚
